definition: lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
and/to reach/up to/in time for

sentences.english: The Carpathians are far from that country.
sentences.chinese: 喀尔巴阡山是在该国鞭长莫及的地方。

sentences.english: And anti-pollution measures and regulations are falling far short of getting to grips with it.
sentences.chinese: 而反污染措施及规章则鞭长莫及，束手无策。

sentences.english: I cannot help him because it is beyond my grasp.
sentences.chinese: 我不能帮助他，是因为我鞭长莫及。

sentences.english: To respond to the regime, the national law also can't reach the rural area.
sentences.chinese: 与政权相呼应，国家法对于乡村僻壤也显得鞭长莫及。

definition: water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here/(fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3

definition: the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: lit. the sky is high and the emperor is far away (idiom)/fig. remote places are beyond the reach of the central government
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
lit. distant water does not cure present thirst; fig. urgent need/a slow remedy does not address immediate needs
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 bu4 jie3 jin4 ke3

definition: impotent (idiom)/powerless/helpless
It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
powerless to defend oneself (idiom); helpless
to sit and watch, but remain indifferent (idiom)
to lift a siege/to help sb out of trouble or embarrassment
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
a conflict arises close to home (idiom)
isolated and without help
lit. to refrain from shooting at the rat for fear of breaking the vases (idiom)/to not act against an evil so as to prevent harm to innocents
beyond one's reach or power (to do sth)
